010package SIFT;
011
012import java.awt.Color;
013import java.util.List;
014
015import ij.IJ;
016import ij.ImagePlus;
017import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
018import ij.io.LogStream;
019import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
020import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
021import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
022import imagingbook.pub.sift.SiftDescriptor;
023import imagingbook.pub.sift.SiftDetector;
024import imagingbook.pub.sift.util.Colors;
025import imagingbook.pub.sift.util.SiftOverlay;
026
027/**
028 * This plugin extracts multi-scale SIFT features from the current 
029 * image and displays them as M-shaped markers.
030 * List of keypoints (if selected) is sorted by descending magnitude.
031 * <br>
032 * 2020/10/04: changed to use {@link SiftOverlay} (subclass of {@link imagingbook.lib.ij.CustomOverlay})
033 *  
034 * @author W. Burger
035 * @version 2020/10/04
036 */
037
038public class Extract_Sift_Features implements PlugInFilter {
039        
040        static {
041                LogStream.redirectSystem();
042        }
043
044        private static double FeatureScale = 1.0; // 1.5;
045        private static double FeatureStrokewidth = 0.5;
046        private static boolean ListSiftFeatures = false;
047
048        ImagePlus imp;
049        Color[] colors = Colors.DefaultDisplayColors;
050        SiftDetector.Parameters params;
051
052        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus imp) {
053                this.imp = imp;
054                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES;
055        }
056
057        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
058                params =  new SiftDetector.Parameters();
059                                                
060                if (!showDialog()) {
061                        return;
062                }
063                
064                FloatProcessor fp = ip.convertToFloatProcessor();
065                SiftDetector sd = new SiftDetector(fp, params);
066                List<SiftDescriptor> features = sd.getSiftFeatures();
067                
068                if (ListSiftFeatures) {
069                        int i = 0;
070                        for (SiftDescriptor sf : features) {
071                                IJ.log(i + ": " + sf.toString());
072                                i++;
073                        }
074                }
075
076                ImageProcessor ip2 = ip.duplicate();
077                ImagePlus imp2 = new ImagePlus(imp.getShortTitle() + "-SIFT", ip2);
078        
079                SiftOverlay oly = new SiftOverlay();
080                oly.setFeatureScale(FeatureScale);
081                oly.strokeWidth(FeatureStrokewidth);
082                for (SiftDescriptor sf : features) {
083                        oly.strokeColor(colors[sf.getScaleLevel() % colors.length]);
084                        oly.addItem(sf);
085                }
086
087                imp2.setOverlay(oly);
088                imp2.show();
089        }
090        
091        private boolean showDialog() {
092                        GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Set SIFT parameters");
093                        gd.addNumericField("tMag :", params.t_Mag, 3, 6, "");
094                        gd.addNumericField("rMax :", params.rho_Max, 3, 6, "");
095                        gd.addNumericField("orientation histogram smoothing :", params.n_Smooth, 0, 6, "");
096                        gd.addCheckbox("list all SIFT features (might be many!)", ListSiftFeatures);
097                        gd.showDialog();
098                        if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
099                                return false;
100                        }
101                        params.t_Mag = gd.getNextNumber();
102                        params.rho_Max = gd.getNextNumber();
103                        params.n_Smooth = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
104                        ListSiftFeatures = gd.getNextBoolean();
105                        if(gd.invalidNumber()) {
106                                IJ.error("Input Error", "Invalid input number");
107                                return false;
108                        }       
109                        return true;
110        }
111        
112}
